Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka have beaten India only once in a bilateral T20I series, when they won 2-1 at home in 2021.
India have won 15 out of 16 T20Is they have played this year.
Suryakumar (133) is currently fifth on the list of most sixes in T20Is.
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka on being the captain
Suryakumar Yadav on Hardik Pandya's role in the side
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was largely unaffected by the forecast for rain during the daytime.
The average first-innings total in Pallekele across five matches was 185.
Spinners fared much better, registering an economy of 7.64, as compared to fast bowlers, who went for 10.58 runs per over.
Others: Matheesha Pathirana had a successful LPL, with an economy of 7.02 in death bowling.
Shubman Gill has admitted that his performance in T20Is leading up to the T20 World Cup was not up to expectations.
